name: oasis-auth-backend
description: GCP Cloud Functions for Oasis authentication demo

scripts.deploy-create: gcloud functions deploy createUser --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --entry-point createUser
scripts.deploy-delete: gcloud functions deploy deleteUser --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --entry-point deleteUser
scripts.deploy-all: npm run deploy-create && npm run deploy-delete
